DOC.brief_title: Dignity Therapy/Life Plan Patients With Pancreatic Advanced Lung Cancer
DOC.criteria: Age > 18 Undergoing chemotherapy pancreatic adenocarcinoma advance NSCLC ( pancreatic arm close ) Englishspeaking Cognitively intact , per clinician judgment , document electronic medical record ( EMR ) Currently receive hospice palliative care service Concurrent diagnosis delirium dementia , per medical record Diagnosis major depression disorder , acute anxiety disorder schizophrenia per medical record Participating psychosocial intervention research study .
